smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'MainActivity' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'EditCalendarRuleFragment' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'RuleAdapter' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'EditRuleFragment' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'RulesFragment' with '21' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function refresh is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class RingerReceiver is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class EditCalendarRuleFragment is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function refresh appears to be too complex.
The function getCaption appears to be too complex.
The function queryList appears to be too complex.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function refresh is nested too deeply.
Function upgradeToVersion is nested too deeply.

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: android.content.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
me.camsteffen.polite.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.widget.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.view.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: TrailingWhitespace
smells.description: Checks which lines end with a whitespace.

instances.message: Line 204 ends with a whitespace.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the package declaration and the list of imports.

smells.name: LoopWithTooManyJumpStatements
smells.description: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.

instances.message: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message:
Parentheses in (ContextCompat.checkSelfPermission(context,
                Manifest.permission.READ_CALENDAR) == PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ContextCompat.checkSelfPermission(context,
                Manifest.permission.READ_CALENDAR) == PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class Event defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
